ability_info.name: swordplay
ability_info.description: Press button at the right time for extra damage!

ability_info.name: spiral cut
ability_info.description: Damages an enemy.
ability_info.effect: Deals strength-based special damage to an enemy.

ability_info.name: slice & dice
ability_info.description: Damages all enemies.
ability_info.effect: Deals six randomly distributed hits of strength-based special damage to enemy party.

ability_info.name: energy rain
ability_info.description: Damages all enemies.
ability_info.effect: Deals strength-based special damage to enemy party.

ability_info.name: blitz ace
ability_info.description: Damages an enemy.
ability_info.effect: Deals eight hits of strength-based special damage to one enemy, plus another, stronger hit, if successful.

ability_info.name: grand summon
ability_info.description: Summon an aeon in Overdrive!
ability_info.effect: Summons an aeon with its overdrive gauge fully charged. After using the overdrive, the gauge reverts back to where it was before the summon, making it possible to use two overdrives consecutively.

ability_info.name: grand summon
ability_info.description: Summon the aeon Valefor.
ability_info.effect: Summons Valefor with her overdrive gauge fully charged. After using the overdrive, the gauge reverts back to where it was before the summon, making it possible to use two overdrives consecutively.

ability_info.name: grand summon
ability_info.description: Summon the aeon Ifrit.
ability_info.effect: Summons Ifrit with his overdrive gauge fully charged. After using the overdrive, the gauge reverts back to where it was before the summon, making it possible to use two overdrives consecutively.

ability_info.name: grand summon
ability_info.description: Summon the aeon Ixion.
ability_info.effect: Summons Ixion with his overdrive gauge fully charged. After using the overdrive, the gauge reverts back to where it was before the summon, making it possible to use two overdrives consecutively.

ability_info.name: grand summon
ability_info.description: Summon the aeon Shiva.
ability_info.effect: Summons Shiva with her overdrive gauge fully charged. After using the overdrive, the gauge reverts back to where it was before the summon, making it possible to use two overdrives consecutively.

ability_info.name: grand summon
ability_info.description: Summon the aeon Bahamut.
ability_info.effect: Summons Bahamut with his overdrive gauge fully charged. After using the overdrive, the gauge reverts back to where it was before the summon, making it possible to use two overdrives consecutively.

ability_info.name: grand summon
ability_info.description: Summon the aeon Anima.
ability_info.effect: Summons Anima with her overdrive gauge fully charged. After using the overdrive, the gauge reverts back to where it was before the summon, making it possible to use two overdrives consecutively.

ability_info.name: grand summon
ability_info.description: Summon the aeon Yojimbo.
ability_info.effect: Summons Yojimbo with his overdrive gauge fully charged. After using the overdrive, the gauge reverts back to where it was before the summon, making it possible to use two overdrives consecutively.

ability_info.name: grand summon
ability_info.description: Summon the Magus Sisters.
ability_info.effect: Summons the Magus Sisters with their overdrive gauges fully charged. After using the overdrive, the gauges revert back to where they were before the summon, making it possible to use two overdrives consecutively.

ability_info.name: slots
ability_info.description: Get the right combination for the ultimate shot!

ability_info.name: element reels
ability_info.description: Spins elemental damage slots.
ability_info.effect: Deals strength-based special damage to a random enemy. If at least two symbols match, the attack gains the corresponding element. If three symbols match, this overdrive hits all enemies. Red = Fire; Yellow = Lightning; Blue = Water; White = Ice.

ability_info.name: attack reels
ability_info.description: Spins multiple attack slots.
ability_info.effect: Deals a varying amount of randomly distributed hits to enemy party. The amount of hits is determined by the slots. If three symbols match, the amount of hits gets doubled, for a maximum possible amount of 12 hits.

overdrives.unlock_condition: Appears as a prize in a blitzball tournament.

ability_info.name: status reels
ability_info.description: Spins status ailment slots.
ability_info.effect: Deals strength-based special damage to a random enemy. If at least two symbols match, the attack inflicts the corresponding status ailments. If three symbols match, this overdrive hits all enemies. Skull = Sleep, Silence, Darkness, Poison; Arrow = Full Break; Hourglass = Petrification and Delay.

overdrives.unlock_condition: Appears as a prize in a blitzball league after unlocking Attack Reels and participating in 250 battles outside of the Monster Arena.

ability_info.name: aurochs reels
ability_info.description: Spins Aurochs custom slots.
ability_info.effect: Combines the symbols of Element and Status Reels and adds an Aurochs Symbol into the Slots. Deals strength-based special damage to a random enemy. If at least two symbols match, the attack gains the corresponding effect. If three symbols match, this overdrive hits all enemies. Two or three Aurochs-Symbols result in the Aurochs Shot, which is a powerful attack without any side-effects.

overdrives.unlock_condition: Appears as a prize in a blitzball tournament after unlocking Status Reels and participating in 450 battles outside of the Monster Arena.

ability_info.name: fury
ability_info.description: Unleash a barrage of spells on the enemy!

ability_info.name: fire fury
ability_info.description: Cast multiple fire spells.
ability_info.effect: Casts multiple Fire-spells that are randomly distributed and deal magic-based special damage. The amount of spells cast depends on Lulu's magic. At 255 magic, the maximum amount of casts is 16.

ability_info.name: thunder fury
ability_info.description: Cast multiple lightning spells.
ability_info.effect: Casts multiple Thunder-spells that are randomly distributed and deal magic-based special damage. The amount of spells cast depends on Lulu's magic. At 255 magic, the maximum amount of casts is 16.

ability_info.description: Cast multiple water spells.
ability_info.effect: Casts multiple Water-spells that are randomly distributed and deal magic-based special damage. The amount of spells cast depends on Lulu's magic. At 255 magic, the maximum amount of casts is 16.

ability_info.effect: Casts multiple Watera-spells that are randomly distributed and deal magic-based special damage. The amount of spells cast depends on Lulu's magic. At 255 magic, the maximum amount of casts is 16.

ability_info.name: blizzara fury
ability_info.description: Cast multiple ice spells.
ability_info.effect: Casts multiple Blizzara-spells that are randomly distributed and deal magic-based special damage. The amount of spells cast depends on Lulu's magic. At 255 magic, the maximum amount of casts is 16.

ability_info.name: firaga fury
ability_info.description: Cast multiple fire spells.
ability_info.effect: Casts multiple Firaga-spells that are randomly distributed and deal magic-based special damage. The amount of spells cast depends on Lulu's magic. At 255 magic, the maximum amount of casts is 12.

ability_info.name: thundaga fury
ability_info.description: Cast multiple lightning spells.
ability_info.effect: Casts multiple Thundaga-spells that are randomly distributed and deal magic-based special damage. The amount of spells cast depends on Lulu's magic. At 255 magic, the maximum amount of casts is 12.

ability_info.name: waterga fury
ability_info.description: Cast multiple water spells.
ability_info.effect: Casts multiple Waterga-spells that are randomly distributed and deal magic-based special damage. The amount of spells cast depends on Lulu's magic. At 255 magic, the maximum amount of casts is 12.

ability_info.name: blizzaga fury
ability_info.description: Cast multiple ice spells.
ability_info.effect: Casts multiple Blizzaga-spells that are randomly distributed and deal magic-based special damage. The amount of spells cast depends on Lulu's magic. At 255 magic, the maximum amount of casts is 12.

ability_info.name: bio fury
ability_info.description: Cast multiple poison spells.
ability_info.effect: Casts multiple Bio-spells that are randomly distributed and inflict poison with an 80% infliction rate. The amount of spells cast depends on Lulu's magic. At 255 magic, the maximum amount of casts is 12.

ability_info.name: demi fury
ability_info.description: Cast multiple spells that each reduce HP by 1/8.
ability_info.effect: Casts multiple Demi-spells that reduce the enemy party's HP by 1/8 per spell (ignores Shell). The amount of spells cast depends on Lulu's magic. At 255 magic, the maximum amount of casts is 12.

ability_info.name: death fury
ability_info.description: Cast multiple death spells.
ability_info.effect: Casts multiple Death-spells that are randomly distributed and have an 80% infliction rate. The amount of spells cast depends on Lulu's magic. At 255 magic, the maximum amount of casts is 12.

ability_info.name: drain fury
ability_info.description: Cast multiple spells that absorb HP.
ability_info.effect: Casts multiple Drain-spells that are randomly distributed and deal magic-based special damage. The amount of spells cast depends on Lulu's magic. At 255 magic, the maximum amount of casts is 16.

ability_info.name: osmose fury
ability_info.description: Cast multiple spells that absorb MP.
ability_info.effect: Casts multiple Osmose-spells that are randomly distributed and deal magic-based special damage. The amount of spells cast depends on Lulu's magic. At 255 magic, the maximum amount of casts is 16.

ability_info.name: flare fury
ability_info.description: Cast multiple non-elemental damage spells.
ability_info.effect: Casts multiple Flare-spells that are randomly distributed and deal magic-based special damage. The amount of spells cast depends on Lulu's magic. At 255 magic, the maximum amount of casts is 7.

ability_info.name: ultima fury
ability_info.description: Cast multiple non-elemental damage spells.
ability_info.effect: Casts multiple Ultima-spells that deal magic-based special damage. The amount of spells cast depends on Lulu's magic. At 255 magic, the maximum amount of casts is 4.

ability_info.name: ronso rage
ability_info.description: Use fiends’ skills against them!

ability_info.name: jump
ability_info.description: Damages an enemy.
ability_info.effect: Deals strength-based special damage to an enemy.

ability_info.name: fire breath
ability_info.description: Deals fire damage to all enemies.
ability_info.effect: Deals magic-based fire-elemental special damage to all enemies.

overdrives.unlock_condition: Use Lancet on Dual Horn, Valaha, Grendel, or Yenke Ronso.

ability_info.name: seed cannon
ability_info.description: Damages an enemy.
ability_info.effect: Deals strength-based special damage to an enemy.

ability_info.name: self destruct
ability_info.description: Sacrifice life to heavily damage an enemy.
ability_info.effect: Ejects Kimahri from the battle and deals a fixed amount of special damage to an enemy. The amount of damage dealt is Kimahri's max HP times 3.

overdrives.unlock_condition: Use Lancet on Bomb, Grenade, Puroboros, or Biran Ronso.

ability_info.name: thrust kick
ability_info.description: Deals damage and ejects enemy from battle.
ability_info.effect: Deals strength-based special damage to an enemy and ejects it from the battle, if possible.

overdrives.unlock_condition: Use Lancet on YKT-63, YKT-11, or Biran Ronso.

ability_info.name: stone breath
ability_info.description: Petrifies all enemies.
ability_info.effect: Petrifies all enemies.

overdrives.unlock_condition: Use Lancet on Basilisk, Anacondaur, or Yenke Ronso.

ability_info.name: aqua breath
ability_info.description: Deals water damage to all enemies.
ability_info.effect: Deals magic-based water-elemental special damage to all enemies.

overdrives.unlock_condition: Use Lancet on Chimera, Chimera Brain, or Yenke Ronso.

ability_info.name: doom
ability_info.description: Counts down to an enemy's doom.
ability_info.effect: Inflicts Doom on an enemy.

overdrives.unlock_condition: Use Lancet on Ghost, Wraith, or Biran Ronso.

ability_info.name: white wind
ability_info.description: Restores party’s HP.
ability_info.effect: Restores HP of party (magic-based; ignores Shell).

overdrives.unlock_condition: Use Lancet on Dark Flan, Spirit, or Yenke Ronso (after he used it).

ability_info.name: bad breath
ability_info.description: Inflicts status ailments on all enemies.
ability_info.effect: Inflicts Sleep, Silence, Darkness (10 turns each), and Poison on all enemies.

overdrives.unlock_condition: Use Lancet on Malboro, or Great Malboro.

ability_info.name: mighty guard
ability_info.description: Cast defensive spells on party.
ability_info.effect: Casts NulAll, Shell, and Protect on party.

overdrives.unlock_condition: Use Lancet on Behemoth, Behemoth King, or Biran Ronso (after he used it).

ability_info.name: nova
ability_info.description: Damages all enemies.
ability_info.effect: Deals magic-based non-elemental special damage to all enemies.

overdrives.unlock_condition: Use Lancet on Omega Weapon, or Nemesis.

ability_info.name: bushido
ability_info.description: Enter commands for a lethal sword attack!

ability_info.name: dragon fang
ability_info.description: Damages all enemies.
ability_info.effect: Deals strength-based special damage to all enemies. Also inflicts weak Delay, if the minigame was completed successfully.

ability_info.name: shooting star
ability_info.description: Damages an enemy.
ability_info.effect: Deals strength-based special damage to one enemy and also ejects it from battle, if the minigame was completed successfully.

overdrives.unlock_condition: Defeat Spherimorph and watch Jecht's Sphere.

ability_info.name: banishing blade
ability_info.description: Damages an enemy.
ability_info.effect: Deals strength-based special damage to one enemy. Also inflicts Full Break, if the minigame was completed successfully.

ability_info.name: tornado
ability_info.description: Damages all enemies.
ability_info.effect: Deals strength-based special damage to all enemies. Adds a second, stronger hit, if the minigame was completed successfully.

ability_info.name: mix
ability_info.description: Combine items for various effects!

ability_info.name: grenade
ability_info.description: Damages all enemies.
ability_info.effect: Deals around 350 HP of non-elemental special damage to all enemies (can critical).

ability_info.name: frag grenade
ability_info.description: Damage and Armor Break to all enemies.
ability_info.effect: Inflicts Armor Break on all enemies and deals around 800 HP of non-elemental special damage (can critical).

ability_info.name: pineapple
ability_info.description: Damages all enemies.
ability_info.effect: Deals around 1350 HP of non-elemental special damage to all enemies (can critical).

ability_info.name: potato masher
ability_info.description: Damages all enemies.
ability_info.effect: Deals around 2700 HP of non-elemental special damage to all enemies (can critical).

ability_info.name: cluster bomb
ability_info.description: Damages all enemies.
ability_info.effect: Deals around 5000 HP of non-elemental special damage to all enemies (can critical).

ability_info.name: tallboy
ability_info.description: Damages all enemies.
ability_info.effect: Deals around 9000 HP of non-elemental special damage to all enemies (can critical).

ability_info.name: blaster mine
ability_info.description: Damage and status ailments to all enemies.
ability_info.effect: Inflicts Sleep, Silence, and Darkness (3 turns each) on all enemies and deals around 1100 HP of non-elemental special damage (can critical).

ability_info.name: hazardous shell
ability_info.description: Damage and status ailments to all enemies.
ability_info.effect: Inflicts Sleep, Silence, and Darkness (4 turns each), and Poison on all enemies and deals around 2250 HP of non-elemental special damage (can critical).

ability_info.name: calamity bomb
ability_info.description: Damage and status ailments to all enemies.
ability_info.effect: Inflicts Sleep, Silence, and Darkness (5 turns each), Poison, and Full Break on all enemies and deals around 3600 HP of non-elemental special damage (can critical).

ability_info.name: chaos grenade
ability_info.description: Damage and status ailments to all enemies.
ability_info.effect: Inflicts Sleep, Silence, and Darkness (8 turns each), Poison, Slow, and Full Break on all enemies and deals around 7300 HP of non-elemental special damage (can critical).

ability_info.name: heat blaster
ability_info.description: Deals fire damage to all enemies.
ability_info.effect: Deals five randomly distributed hits to enemy party that deal about 400 HP of fire-elemental special damage each.

ability_info.name: firestorm
ability_info.description: Deals fire damage to all enemies.
ability_info.effect: Deals six randomly distributed hits to enemy party that deal about 700 HP of fire-elemental special damage each.

ability_info.name: burning soul

ability_info.effect: Deals nine randomly distributed hits to enemy party that deal about 900 HP of fire-elemental special damage each.

ability_info.name: brimstone
ability_info.description: Fire damage and status ailments to all enemies.
ability_info.effect: Deals three randomly distributed hits to enemy party that deal about 400 HP of fire-elemental special damage each. Each hit inflicts Sleep, Silence, and Darkness (3 turns each), and Poison on an enemy.

ability_info.name: abaddon flame
ability_info.description: Fire damage and status ailments to all enemies.
ability_info.effect: Deals three randomly distributed hits to enemy party that deal about 900 HP of fire-elemental special damage each. Each hit inflicts Sleep, Silence, and Darkness (4 turns each), Poison, and Full Break on an enemy.

ability_info.name: thunderbolt
ability_info.description: Deals lightning damage to all enemies.
ability_info.effect: Deals five randomly distributed hits to enemy party that deal about 400 HP of lightning-elemental special damage each.

ability_info.description: Deals lightning damage to all enemies.
ability_info.effect: Deals six randomly distributed hits to enemy party that deal about 700 HP of lightning-elemental special damage each.

ability_info.description: Deals lightning damage to all enemies.
ability_info.effect: Deals nine randomly distributed hits to enemy party that deal about 900 HP of lightning-elemental special damage each.

ability_info.name: electroshock

ability_info.effect: Deals three randomly distributed hits to enemy party that deal about 400 HP of lightning-elemental special damage each. Each hit inflicts Sleep, Silence, and Darkness (3 turns each), and Poison on an enemy.

ability_info.name: thunderblast
ability_info.description: Lightning damage and status ailments to all enemies.
ability_info.effect: Deals three randomly distributed hits to enemy party that deal about 900 HP of lightning-elemental special damage each. Each hit inflicts Sleep, Silence, and Darkness (4 turns each), Poison, and Full Break on an enemy.

ability_info.effect: Deals nine randomly distributed hits to enemy party that deal about 900 HP of ice-elemental special damage each.

ability_info.name: black ice
ability_info.description: Ice damage and status ailments to all enemies.
ability_info.effect: Deals three randomly distributed hits to enemy party that deal about 400 HP of ice-elemental special damage each. Each hit inflicts Sleep, Silence, and Darkness (3 turns each), and Poison on an enemy.

ability_info.name: krysta
ability_info.description: Ice damage and status ailments to all enemies.
ability_info.effect: Deals three randomly distributed hits to enemy party that deal about 900 HP of ice-elemental special damage each. Each hit inflicts Sleep, Silence, and Darkness (4 turns each), Poison, and Full Break on an enemy.

ability_info.name: nega burst
ability_info.description: Reduces HP of all enemies by 3/4.
ability_info.effect: Deals gravity-based special damage to target party equal to 3/4 of their current HP.

ability_info.name: black hole
ability_info.description: Reduces HP of all enemies by 15/16.
ability_info.effect: Deals gravity-based special damage to target party equal to 15/16 of their current HP.

ability_info.name: sunburst
ability_info.description: Deals damage to all enemies.
ability_info.effect: Deals a fixed 19998 HP of non-elemental special damage to all enemies. Can break the damage limit without the auto-ability equipped.

ability_info.name: ultra potion
ability_info.description: Restores HP of party.
ability_info.effect: Fully restores HP of party.

ability_info.name: panacea
ability_info.description: Cures party of all status ailments.
ability_info.effect: Cures all status ailments of party, except breaks, doom, and KO.

ability_info.name: ultra cure
ability_info.description: Restores HP and cures all status ailments of party.
ability_info.effect: Restores HP of party by half and cures all status ailments, except breaks, doom, and KO.

ability_info.name: mega phoenix
ability_info.description: Revives party from KO status.
ability_info.effect: Revives party from KO and fully restores HP of revived characters (maximum of 9,999 HP). Damages characters inflicted with Zombie and instant KO's them.

ability_info.name: final phoenix
ability_info.description: Revives party from KO status and fully restores HP.
ability_info.effect: Revives party from KO and fully restores HP of all characters. Damages characters inflicted with Zombie and instant KO's them.

ability_info.name: elixir
ability_info.description: Fully restores HP & MP of one character.
ability_info.effect: Fully restores HP & MP of a random character (maximum of 9,999 HP and 999 MP). Damages characters inflicted with Zombie.

ability_info.name: megalixir
ability_info.description: Fully restores HP & MP of party.
ability_info.effect: Fully restores HP & MP of all characters (maximum of 9,999 HP and 999 MP). Damages characters inflicted with Zombie.

ability_info.name: super elixir
ability_info.description: Full HP & MP to party and cures all status ailments.
ability_info.effect: Fully restores HP & MP of all characters and cures all status ailments, except breaks, doom, and KO. Damages characters inflicted with Zombie.

ability_info.name: final elixir
ability_info.description: Restores party to full health.
ability_info.effect: Revives party from KO and fully restores HP & MP of all characters. Cures all status ailments, except breaks, doom, and KO. Can break the damage limit without the auto-ability equipped. Damages characters inflicted with Zombie and instant KO's them.

ability_info.name: nulall
ability_info.description: Defends a character from all elements.
ability_info.effect: Casts NulAll on a random character.

ability_info.name: mega nulall
ability_info.description: Defends party from all elements.
ability_info.effect: Casts NulAll on party.

ability_info.name: hyper nulall
ability_info.description: Defends party from all elements. Adds Cheer & Focus.
ability_info.effect: Casts NulAll on party. Also adds five times Cheer and Focus.

ability_info.name: ultra nulall
ability_info.description: Defends party from all elements and raises attributes.
ability_info.effect: Casts NulAll on party. Also adds five times Cheer, Focus, Aim and Reflex.

ability_info.name: mighty wall
ability_info.description: Casts Shell and Protect on party.
ability_info.effect: Casts Shell and Protect on party.

ability_info.name: mighty g
ability_info.description: Casts Shell, Protect, and Haste on party.
ability_info.effect: Casts Shell, Protect, and Haste on party.

ability_info.name: super mighty g
ability_info.description: Casts Mighty G and Regen on party.
ability_info.effect: Casts Shell, Protect, Haste, and Regen (20 turns) on party.

ability_info.name: hyper mighty g
ability_info.description: Casts Mighty G, Regen, and Auto-Life on party.
ability_info.effect: Casts Shell, Protect, Haste, Regen (20 turns), and Auto-Life on party.

ability_info.name: vitality
ability_info.description: Doubles max HP of one character.
ability_info.effect: Doubles max HP of a random character (maximum of 9,999 HP without 'Break HP Limit'). Effect goes away when KO'd.

ability_info.name: mega vitality
ability_info.description: Doubles max HP of party.
ability_info.effect: Doubles max HP of party (maximum of 9,999 HP without 'Break HP Limit'). Effect goes away when KO'd.

ability_info.name: hyper vitality
ability_info.description: Doubles max HP and bestows Cheer on party.
ability_info.effect: Doubles max HP of party (maximum of 9,999 HP without 'Break HP Limit'). Also adds five times Cheer. Effect goes away when KO'd.

ability_info.name: mana
ability_info.description: Doubles max MP of one character.
ability_info.effect: Doubles max MP of a random character (maximum of 999 MP without 'Break MP Limit'). Effect goes away when KO'd.

ability_info.name: mega mana
ability_info.description: Doubles max MP of party.
ability_info.effect: Doubles max MP of party (maximum of 999 MP without 'Break MP Limit'). Effect goes away when KO'd.

ability_info.name: hyper mana
ability_info.description: Doubles max MP and bestows Focus on party.
ability_info.effect: Doubles max MP of party (maximum of 999 MP without 'Break MP Limit'). Also adds five times Focus. Effect goes away when KO'd.

ability_info.name: freedom
ability_info.description: Reduces MP cost of one character’s abilities to 0.
ability_info.effect: Reduces MP cost of a random character to 0. Effect goes away when KO'd.

ability_info.name: freedom x
ability_info.description: Reduces MP cost of party’s abilities to 0.
ability_info.effect: Reduces MP cost of party to 0. Effect goes away when KO'd.

ability_info.name: quartet of 9
ability_info.description: Augments one character’s attacks to 9999 damage.
ability_info.effect: The damage and heals of a random character always amount to at least 9999 HP. Effect goes away when KO'd.

ability_info.name: trio of 9999
ability_info.description: Augments party’s attacks to 9999 damage.
ability_info.effect: The damage and heals of all characters always amount to at least 9999 HP. Effect goes away when KO'd.

ability_info.name: hero drink
ability_info.description: Allows character’s attacks to deal critical damage. Effect goes away when KO'd.
ability_info.effect: A random character always does critical hits.

ability_info.name: miracle drink
ability_info.description: Allows party’s attacks to deal critical damage. Effect goes away when KO'd.
ability_info.effect: The party always does critical hits.

ability_info.name: hot spurs
ability_info.description: Accelerates party’s Overdrive gauges.
ability_info.effect: The party's Overdrive charge rate is multiplied by a factor of 1.5. This stacks with equipped Auto-Abilities and 'Eccentrick'. Effect goes away when KO'd.

ability_info.name: eccentrick
ability_info.description: Hyper-accelerates party’s Overdrive gauges.
ability_info.effect: The party's Overdrive charge rate is multiplied by a factor of 2. This stacks with equipped Auto-Abilities and 'Hot Spurs'. Effect goes away when KO'd.

ability_info.name: requiem
ability_info.description: Damages all enemies.
ability_info.effect: Deals non-elemental magic damage to all enemies.

ability_info.name: energy ray
ability_info.description: Deals non-elemental damage to all enemies.
ability_info.effect: Deals magic-based non-elemental special damage to all enemies.

ability_info.name: energy blast
ability_info.description: Deals non-elemental damage to all enemies.
ability_info.effect: Deals magic-based non-elemental special damage to all enemies.

ability_info.name: hellfire
ability_info.description: Deals fire damage to all enemies.
ability_info.effect: Deals magic-based fire-elemental special damage to all enemies.

ability_info.name: thor's hammer
ability_info.description: Deals lightning damage to all enemies.
ability_info.effect: Deals magic-based lightning-elemental special damage to all enemies.

ability_info.effect: Deals magic-based ice-elemental special damage to all enemies.

ability_info.effect: Deals magic-based non-elemental special damage to all enemies.

ability_info.name: oblivion
ability_info.description: Deals non-elemental damage to all enemies.
ability_info.effect: Deals 16 hits of strength-based special damage to all enemies.

ability_info.name: delta attack
ability_info.description: The Magus Sisters' combined attack.
ability_info.effect: Deals 6 hits of strength-based special damage to all enemies. Each hit can get a critical hit.
